team.name: Dr.-Ing. Stefan Schulte
team.info: Dr.-Ing. Stefan Schulte is Associate Professor at TU Wien and the head of CDL-BOT. In 2010, Stefan finished his PhD at TU Darmstadt summa cum laude. He joined TU Wien in 2011. His research interests are in the areas of blockchain technologies and the Internet of Things.

team.name: Dipl.-Ing. Michael Sober
team.info: Michael is a research assistant and PhD student at the Distributed Systems Group of the Institute of Information Systems Engineering at TU Wien. After finishing his bachelor studies in Software & Information Engineering in 2018, he received his master's degree in Software Engineering/Internet Computing from TU Wien in 2020.

team.name: Giulia Scaffino, MSc
team.info: Giulia Scaffino is a PhD student at TU Wien. After her MSc degree in Nuclear Physics in 2019, she now works in the Distributed Systems Group of the Institute of Information Systems Engineering.

team.name: Theresa Müller, BSc
team.info: Theresa Müller supports the CDL-BOT team as university assistant and is currently studying Software Engineering and Internet Computing at TU Wien. Before, she finished her BSc in Media Informatics at LMU München in 2019.

team.name: Leonhard Esterbauer, BSc
team.info: Leonhard Esterbauer supports the CDL-BOT team as university assistant and is currently studying Software Engineering and Internet Computing at TU Wien. Before, he finished his BSc in Software Engineering at TU Wien in 2019.
